post.title: Nijisanji Festival 2022 Confirms LazuLight and Hana Macchia's 3D Debut
post.content:
Nijisanji announced on Twitter that the LazuLight trio of Elira Pendora, Pomu Rainpuff and Finana Ryugu as well as Hana Macchia will have their 3D model debuts at the upcoming Nijisanji Festival 2022 this October.

Details for Open Stage on Day 2 (Sunday, October 2) indicate that the four VTubers are set to perform in 3D:

Catch @EliraPendora @PomuRainpuff @FinanaRyugu alongside @Hana_Macchia in a special 3D performance at #NIJIFes2022!!üéâ#„Å´„Åò„Éï„Çß„Çπ2022 https://t.co/aDqS7JuMnG

— NIJISANJI EN Official (@NIJISANJI_World) August 6, 2022

The Open Stage will be streamed live on Nijisanji's official YouTube Channel.

Several Nijisanji talents are also set to appear in their 3D form at the weekend event, including Morinaka Kazaki, Selene Girls' Academy Drama Club, and select members of VirtuaReal.

Other Nijisanji EN talents who will be present in 2D are Obsydia, Ethyria, Luxiem's Shu Yamino, Vox Akuma and Mysta Rias.

post.description: Nijisanji announced on Twitter that the LazuLight trio of Elira Pendora, Pomu Rainpuff and Finana Ryugu as well as Hana Macchia will have their 3D model debuts at the upcoming Nijisanji Festival 2022 this October.

node.description: Konami's Dance Dance Revolution A3 on Twitter announced the addition of Kanaria's hit track KING as well as Yoidore Shirazu. Both songs were added to the game from 10:00am JST on Wednesday, August 10, 2022.
